data: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia Pierce the Veil discography Studio albums 5 Singles 15 Video albums 1 Music videos 19 Pierce the Veil is an American rock band from San Diego , California , formed in 2006. They have released five studio albums, fifteen singles, and nineteen music videos. Studio albums [ edit ] List of studio albums, with selected chart positions, sales and certifications Title Album details Peak chart positions Sales Certifications US [ 1 ] US Alt.
